scripts.localnet: npm run localnet:down || exit 0; solana-test-validator -q -r --ledger .anchor/test-ledger --mint $(solana-keygen pubkey ~/.config/solana/id.json) --bind-address 0.0.0.0 --url https://api.devnet.solana.com --rpc-port 8899 --clone 2TfB33aLaneQb5TNVwyDz3jSZXS6jdW2ARw1Dgf84XCG `# programId` --clone J4CArpsbrZqu1axqQ4AnrqREs3jwoyA1M5LMiQQmAzB9 `# programDataAddress` --clone CKwZcshn4XDvhaWVH9EXnk3iu19t6t5xP2Sy2pD6TRDp `# idlAddress` --clone BYM81n8HvTJuqZU1PmTVcwZ9G8uoji7FKM6EaPkwphPt `# programState` --clone FVLfR6C2ckZhbSwBzZY4CX7YBcddUSge5BNeGQv5eKhy `# switchboardVault` & npm run localnet:wait
scripts.localnet:wait: for attempt in {1..30}; do sleep 1; if curl -sS http://localhost:8899 -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1, "method":"getBlockHeight"}'; then echo ready; break; fi; done
scripts.network:start: sbv2 solana network start --keypair ~/.config/solana/id.json --schemaFile .switchboard/networks/default.json --cluster localnet --nodeImage dev-v2-RC_01_05_23_20_01-beta
scripts.build: anchor build && npm run client:gen && npx prettier client/generated --write
scripts.test: npm run localnet && npm run network:create && npm run network:start & sleep 60 && anchor test --skip-local-validator
scripts.test:dev: npm run localnet && npm run network:create && npm run network:start:dev & sleep 15 && anchor test --skip-local-validator
